price: 53. Ni-Rabbow Atu injiil kitaabal oobissem Nummasneeh ku- farmoyta Nabii Qiisa katatnehik, ku-inkittinaaneh Sumaaqiteeh ku-Ambiya farmo guddusseemih Sumaaqite mará (Nabii Mucammad ummatta kinnuk) luk nee uktub iyyen.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا بِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ وَٱتَّبَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَ فَٱكۡتُبۡنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā āmannā bimā anzalta wa-ittabaʿnā al-rasūla fa-uk'tub'nā maʿa al-shāhidīna
